# Typography Guidelines
Primary - White
Primary Light - Blue Gray 100
Primary Dark - Blue Gray 800
Accent - Amber 600
Accent Dark - Amber 800
Secondary -Cyan 400
Secondary Dark - Cyan 600
Error - Red 700
Background Color - Blue Gray 50
